content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'metastore-catalog_sadataengci_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [metastore-catalog_sadataengci_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://metastore-catalog@sadataengci.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.stream_analytics_telco (
	[TimeS] nvarchar(4000),
	[CallingCellID] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalledCellID] nvarchar(4000),
	[IncomingTrunk] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalledNum2] nvarchar(4000),
	[FCIFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[RecordType] nvarchar(4000),
	[SystemIdentity] nvarchar(4000),
	[FileNum] nvarchar(4000),
	[SwitchNum] nvarchar(4000),
	[CallingNum] nvarchar(4000),
	[CallingIMSI] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalledNum] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalledIMSI] nvarchar(4000),
	[DateS] nvarchar(4000),
	[TimeType] bigint,
	[CallPeriod] bigint,
	[ServiceType] nvarchar(4000),
	[Transfer] bigint,
	[OutgoingTrunk] nvarchar(4000),
	[MSRN] nvarchar(4000),
	[callrecTime] nvarchar(4000),
	[EventProcessedUtcTime] datetime2(7),
	[PartitionId] bigint,
	[EventEnqueuedUtcTime] datetime2(7)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'ucext/synapse_spark_pool/streamanalytics_telco_ingest/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [metastore-catalog_sadataengci_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT * FROM dbo.stream_analytics_telco
GO
